definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: So automatically they saw a 50 percent uptake in using the enterprise services.
sentences.chinese: 因此它们自动地领会了在使用企业服务中50%要领。

sentences.english: Those who grasped his message could become as divine as Christ himself.

sentences.english: The first and foremost essential in studying and following through the spirit of the congress is to go deep into the theme of the congress.
sentences.chinese: 学习贯彻十七大精神，首先要深刻领会十七大的主题。

sentences.english: Understand the loving care the characters show to disabled people.
sentences.chinese: 认真领会剧中主人公为残疾儿童献爱心的精神。

sentences.english: Remember, to truly understand Ultimate Reality you
sentences.chinese: 记住，要真正领会终极实相，你得走出你的心智。

sentences.english: And for a long time I didn`t miss it.
sentences.chinese: 好长时间我都没有领会。

sentences.english: "Now you understand the Oriental passion for tea, " said Japhy.
sentences.chinese: “现在你领会到那东方人对茶的狂热，”贾菲说。

sentences.english: Nanrong Chu couldn't understand completely the dogmatic instruction.
sentences.chinese: 南荣趎对这样教条式的说法还是不能完全领会。

sentences.english: We in today trip, the will to understand the three gorges water magic.

sentences.english: You have to go behind the poet's words to see what she really means.
sentences.chinese: 你得进一不研究诗人的语言去领会她确切的意思。

sentences.english: He sees more and comprehends more of what he sees.
sentences.chinese: 他看到的越多，就对所见领会地越多。

sentences.english: Have you got the point yet?
sentences.chinese: 你们已经领会到这一点了吗？

sentences.english: Enlisted soldier's experience lets I more profound experience army discipline the significance.

sentences.english: If you never made a mistake, How would you know that I am a forgiver?
sentences.chinese: 如果你不曾做错事，你怎能领会我的宽恕？

sentences.english: If the idea is just to have fun with words, then gofor it.

definition: to analyze/to try to figure out/to try to fathom
